EX–3 EX–3 "Straw Hat Theatre #3: Obahan Time"Transliteration: "Mugiwara Gekijō Sono San: Obahan Time" (Japanese:麦わら劇場その3「Obahan Time」) N/A N/A October 15, 2006(2006-10-15)[n 8] November 30, 2014

A simple question is answered: if the Straw Hat Pirates were all middle-aged women, who would be the strongest?
